name: deficiently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not good enough: The review failed to show that the attorney had performed deficiently. The system was deficiently designed and implemented. See
deficient
More examplesFewer examplesIf a mother is unable to care for her child adequately, the child will sometimes also parent deficiently.The liver of people who are upset often works deficiently.We need to create laws that are neither overly nor deficiently regulatory.
